categories: Category:Jedi Masters of the Jedi Order

nodes.text: Niobaya was an individual who served the Jedi Order as a Jedi Master. During the Padawan Tournament, Jedi Master Tera Sinube reminded Jedi Initiate Dooku of what Niboya had written regarding attachments shortly before Dooku's duel with his fellow Initiate Sifo-Dyas.
